vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
παροξ-υσμός, ὁ,
irritation, exasperation, [NT+4th c.BC+]; π. ἀγάπης provoking or exciting to.., [NT]
__2 severe fit of a disease, paroxysm, [Refs 5th c.BC+]
vocabInfos.shortDef: sharp disagreement; spurring on, encouraging stirring up
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
sharp disagreement; spurring on, encouraging stirring up
an inciting, incitement, stirring up Heb. 10:24; a sharp fit of anger, sharp contention, angry dispute, Acts 15:39*
vocabInfos._es_Definition: accion de estimular, incitación, aliento, ánimo ; altercado brusco o desacuerdo
vocabInfos._vi_Definition: sự bất đồng ý kiến; sự bất đồng quan điểm. Xem G3947
